name: Work-From-Home Data Entry Scam
description: Scammer lures victim with a high-paying work-from-home data entry job requiring no experience, then asks for a registration fee via UPI before sharing any real job details.

turns.scammer_message: Hi! We have an excellent work-from-home opportunity for you. Earn Rs 50,000-1,00,000 per month doing simple data entry. No experience needed. Interested?
turns.notes: Initial bait message offering a too-good-to-be-true WFH data entry job with high salary.

turns.scammer_message: Great to hear your interest! This is a genuine opportunity from a reputed MNC. We have limited seats available. To discuss further details, please call our HR coordinator at +91-9988112233. She will explain the role and salary structure.
turns.notes: Scammer shares a fake phone number for the supposed HR coordinator.

turns.scammer_message: To secure your position, you need to complete a one-time registration. The registration fee is Rs 2,500 which is fully refundable after your first assignment. Please pay via UPI to wfh.jobs.recruit@paytm and share the screenshot for confirmation.
turns.notes: Scammer asks for a registration fee via UPI, classic job scam tactic.

turns.scammer_message: I understand your hesitation. Let me share our official HR email for verification: hr@wfh-careers-india.com. You can write to them for any queries. But please hurry, only 3 seats left and many candidates are waiting. Pay Rs 2,500 to wfh.jobs.recruit@paytm today itself.
turns.notes: Scammer shares a fake email address for legitimacy and repeats UPI ID with urgency.

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Madam, this is the final reminder. Registration closes today at 6 PM. Pay Rs 2,500 to wfh.jobs.recruit@paytm or call +91-9988112233 immediately. After registration, you will receive your first assignment within 24 hours. Don't miss this life-changing opportunity!
turns.notes: Final pressure message repeating UPI ID and phone number with deadline urgency.
